summary: Sweden is a large Nordic country in Europe, bordering Norway and Finland. It has a long history, dating back to around 12,000 BC, and was once part of the powerful Swedish Empire. Today, it is a modern and developed country with a strong economy and high quality of life. Sweden is a constitutional monarchy with a democratic government. It is known for its universal healthcare and education systems. The country joined the European Union in 1995 and NATO in 2024, and it actively participates in international organizations.
title: Sweden
